ModMetaData.name: [Ods] Star Ship Troopers Powersuits! Updated
ModMetaData.author: Roskii
ModMetaData.description: Powersuits and Morita MK1 Rifles comissioned by the Legendary Commissar Waters. Updated with permission by Roskii Heiral. Also, if you have Royalty, they can perform jumps now (like the novel)
